auto-update-days.help: Number of days to wait before requesting an updated CA certificate (0 - 4294967295, 0 = disabled).
auto-update-days.name: auto-update-days

auto-update-days-warning.help: Number of days before an expiry-warning message is generated (0 - 4294967295, 0 = disabled).
auto-update-days-warning.name: auto-update-days-warning

ca.help: CA certificate as a PEM file.
ca.name: ca

range.help: Either global or VDOM IP address range for the CA certificate.
range.name: range

source-ip.help: Source IP address for communications to the SCEP server.
source-ip.name: source-ip

ssl-inspection-trusted.help: Enable/disable this CA as a trusted CA for SSL inspection.
ssl-inspection-trusted.name: ssl-inspection-trusted
